entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is described as the Head Boy at Hogwarts and working for Gringotts. He is also compared to Percy in terms of his personality.

entities.name: charlie
entities.description: Charlie is described as working with dragons in Romania and having a broad, good-natured face that is weather-beaten and freckly. He is also compared to the twins in terms of his physical appearance.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is described as being long and lanky, and Bill is compared to him in terms of personality.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as being long and lanky.

relationships.description: Charlie lives and works in Romania with dragons.
Bill is compared to Percy in terms of personality.
Charlie is compared to the twins in terms of physical appearance.
Bill is compared to Ron in terms of physical appearance.
